question:
Instructions Read the question below and write a letter. You should spend about 20 minutes on this task. Write at least 150 words.
You stayed at your friend’s house when you participated in a business seminar in the other city. You mistakenly left a file with important documents at their house. Write a letter to your friend, describing the file, tell them why it is important. ask him/her to return it to you by post.
text: Hope you are doing good. I am writing to tell you about the main documents that I left at your home when I last visited for attending a job seminar in your adjacent city.

Last month when I had visited you due to job schedules, I must say it was such a good experience and after so long time. I never expected 3 days visit would turn out to be a short trip. When I went to participate in one of business presentation to another city I got few utmost important documents about the company , which I had to take care of but forgot at your residence.

The file contains the budget of project and other company shares information which is really needed for our valuation of  industry. Also to mention various business handled by them which is an important deciding factor to buy that company or not.

As I mentioned , I would need that file urgently. And I was wondering if you could help me sending that document by speed post, marking it as confidential . That would make sure that documents are kept safe and reach me on time.
I would be grateful for your favour and also invite you to visit my home town and will go together to a good backpack trip nearby.

error_list.error_des: It seems that there is an article usage problem here.
It seems that business may not agree in number with other words in this phrase.
